about_text: Hi I am Solomon Full Stack and Android Developer I have two years of experience in developing starting from simple websites to big systems including EVD (Electronic Voucher Distribution) System for both mobile(android) and web versions.

description: Software Engineer with a good experience on software designing, development, maintenance, deployment and a lot more experience with related fields. Plus, a good problem-solving ability that I can use in different projects and scenarios and I am well formed engineer with two years of experience in software development industries as both project leader and developer.
